nodes.text: Herbs de Lunar Eclipe were herbs used for the cooking of Smapp. At least one Smapp recipe recommended 12 tubes of Herbs de Lunar Eclipse, to be mixed with butter and spread on the meat.

Herbs de Lunar Eclipse was mentioned in a one-page cooking recipe titled "Cooking a Smapp", written by Bob Carrau for the 1993 book Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a publication that collects concept designs and photographs from various George Lucas projects. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
